description: NCOR files are used to compile all resources for authoring DVD content into a single file. The final product may be viewed in Adobe Encore before it is burned to a DVD or Blu-ray disc.

NCOR project files may also be exported for viewing on the Web in Flash. They are bundled with the files flashdvd.swf , AuthoredContent.xml , index.html , and a "Sources folder", which contains .FLV or .F4V video files.
Adobe Encore is included with of Adobe Premiere Pro.
